## 2025-10-28

## Changes

* Added support for pay now deeplink option
* Added metadata to actions methods

### Products

- Switch
- Manage

### Requirements

| Name | Version | 
| ---- | ----  |
| Xcode | >= 16 | 
| iOS | >= 13 | 


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atomicfi/ios-sdk/compare/3.22.0...3.23.0
